text: Edward Joseph Callahan (December 11, 1857 – February 5, 1947) was an American professional baseball outfielder and shortstop. He played for three teams in the Union Association in 1884. ==External links== Category:Major League Baseball outfielders Category:Major League Baseball shortstops Category:St. Louis Maroons players Category:Kansas City Cowboys (UA) players Category:Boston Reds (UA) players Category:19th-century baseball players Category:Baseball players from Massachusetts Category:Sportspeople from Boston Category:1857 births Category:1947 deaths
title: Ed Callahan (baseball)
